arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest XI vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest travel to Anfield on Saturday looking to heap more misery on a struggling Liverpool side. Sean Dyche’s men arrive at Anfield with renewed confidence today. This follows a vital 3-1 win over Leeds United in their last outing. That result broke a nine-match winless streak and showcased a new attacking verve under the […] The post Nottingham Forest XI vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Liverpool return to Premier League action on Saturday, facing a deepening crisis as they host a revitalised Nottingham Forest at Anfield. The reigning champions entered the international break at a low ebb, having lost five of their last six league games. Consequently, Arne Slot’s side has dropped to eighth in the table and desperately needs […] The post Liverpool vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Liverpool lose Wirtz and Bradley ahead of Forest test
arts.sum:
Slot rules out Conor Bradley and Florian Wirtz for Nottingham Forest due to muscle injuries, hinting Bradley could be sidelined for up to a month and reshuffles are likely in the lineup.
Alisson should be back.
